custom-meta.meta-value: The data used in this study are from the Thai Meteorological Department and the Bureau of Epidemiology (BOE), Ministry of Public Health (MOPH), Thailand. They are available for the public, but they are not published on any acceptable repositories. We therefore provide the points of contact in order to obtain the data for replicating the reported findings as follows. - The dengue incidence data can be obtained through the BOE National Disease Surveillance website at http://www.boe.moph.go.th/boedb/surdata/disease.php?ds=66. - The weather data can be obtained (with a fee) from Thai Meteorological Department, 4353 Sukhumvit Road, Bangna, Bangkok, Thailand. Telephone No. +66-2399-4566, +66-2399-4568(-74), +66-2399-4578, +66-2399-4580, +66-2398-0225(-8). All data can be accessed by other researchers.
